column5: We are considering making a lodge change to Press Lake this summer or in 2006 (north of Ignace) and would appreciate any information from those who have been there. Cabins, time of year, actual fishing, etc. Thanks much for you time and info. it is greatly appreciated. MJS

It's a good fishing camp. The cabins are well kept and the rates are good for what you get. The owners will help you find fish. The northern and walleye fishing can be great at anytime of the year but like all fishing it all depends on the weather. The camp fills up really fast so if you want a cabin in 2005 you should make reservations asap.
